title: Record Linkage
description: Represents an assertion for a specific record to be related or linked together.

linked_system_id.description: A valid NRIDS IT Service Management code which identifies the source system, service or asset that the linked data originates from.

linked_record_id.description: The record or primary key representing what record should be linked with the primary header record.

linked_record_kind.description: The kind of record the source system stores this linked record as (i.e. Permit, Project, Submission or Tracking).
